segments.text: Do you have any English songs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have a look . Everything I do I do it for you 、 Unchained melody 、 My heart will go on . Oh , and I ’ d like to try Everything I do I do it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me play it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it easy to locate it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's very easy . Here it is . Ready ? Excellent ! You are a good singer . You sing the bass so well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to be a better singer . I haven't sung in the Karaoke for a long time . It's your turn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll sing a Chinese folk song Love song of Hanging , first in Chinese then in English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's really my pleasure to listen to a Chinese song .
segments.speaker: S2
